content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal mining and storage at position (41, -82)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position (41, -82)) 
-  Wooden chest (position (40.5, -83.5)) for storing coal
-  Wooden chest (position (41.5, -83.5)) for storing coal
-  Burner inserter (position (39.5, -81.5)) for transporting coal

### Furnace at position (0, 0)
Consists of following entities
-  Stone furnace (position (0, 0)) for smelting iron plates

### ERROR TIPS
*   Errors when inserting items into a full inventory
    *   Make sure the inventory of the entity is not full before attempting to insert items.
    *   Check the warnings of the entity for any messages indicating a full inventory.
*   Errors when extracting items from an empty chest
    *   Ensure the chest has items to extract before attempting to extract.
    *   Check the inventory of the chest for any items.
*   Errors when inserting items into a furnace with no ingredients to smelt
    *   Ensure the furnace has ingredients to smelt before attempting to insert items.
    *   Check the furnace_source inventory for any ingredients.

### NAMESPACE
*   No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
*   Important variables:
    *   `coal_chest`: a chest entity for storing coal
    *   `drill`: a burner mining drill entity for mining coal
    *   `furnace`: a stone furnace entity for smelting iron plates
    *   `inserter`: a burner inserter entity for transporting coal
